Name: SincereMen
About the game: Gameplay The game consist of 4 parts: Chopper Shooting Vehicles Pursuit Abandon village Hidden Lab Every part has its own unique gameplay. Shoot the enemies with heavy machine gun on a flying chopper Destroy the enemies armored vehicle with heavy and light machineguns , Rocket launcher and etc... Use mortar to destroy enemy bases and artillery. Use the different equipments the player have. Gameplay Supplements Gun expert : Using different Weapons with different accessory Giving order to his partner : Mark your enemies, your friend will take care of them. Stealth mode and action mode : decide how to proceed stealth or fire
